front.title: Extension to the Link Management Protocol (LMP/DWDM -rfc4209) for Dense Wavelength Division Multiplexing (DWDM) Optical Line Systems to manage optical parameters of DWDM applications

abstract.t: This memo defines extensions to LMP(rfc4209) for managing Optical parameters associated with Wavelength Division Multiplexing (WDM) systems or characterized by the Optical Transport Network (OTN) in accordance with the parameters defined in ITU-T Recommendation G.698.2.[ITU.G698.2], G.694.1.[ITU.G694.1] and their extensions./>
